body.name: Hand Broom and Dustpan Set : Mini Broom and Dustpan Set, Small Broom and Dustpan Set, Whisk Broom and Dustpan Set, Dustpan and Brush Set Clean Kitchens, Tables, and Animal Cages.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 48 mins
features: Multipurpose cleaning: Hand broom and dustpan set are suitable for cleaning various surfaces, such as small areas such as tables/ countertops/ car seat dust; Garbage around pet cages, etc. Mini broom can easily capture dust and debris in narrow corners.

Durable dust pan set: The small broom and dustpan set is mainly made of PP, with a sturdy and durable structure.In addition, dense bristles can easily capture dust and debris in narrow corners. Give you a clean and tidy space.

Nested dust tray and brush: A simple snap function allows the brush to lock to the handle of the dustpan.The design of the nesting and handle hanging ring makes the dustpan set easy to carry and store, saving space.
An effective toothed dustpan - dense bristles easily capture dust and debris, even in narrow corners.The dust pan teeth can remove debris stuck to the brush bristles, such as pet hair and debris

Note: If your dustpan lip or dustpan bristles are bent, please contact us through the path: "Customer service - order history - contact seller - DGiant Dragon", and we will give you a satisfactory reply the first time.
body.description: The mini broom and dustpan set can effectively help you clean gaps and small areas of clutter, and the compact and portable dustpan is convenient to use both indoors and outdoors. 1. Nested stacking 2. Compact & portable 3. Hanging ring at the top of the handle 4. The groove of the dustpan prevents overflow 5. Perfect for desktops, tables, offices, work areas, camping and more

productInformation.value: #127,980 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #144 in Household Dustpans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice quality
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new dust pan combo, because the bristles pulled apart on a different one I bought.This one is much more durable and sturdy. The pan is large and picks up everything swept into it.Excellent value, and I love the blue green color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars decent dust pan
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know why you would sell a broom without a dust pan, but that happened to me. This is a decent option—it’s made of hard plastic except for the rubbery edge and has a hook for hanging. The brush is also decent with very soft bristles. This is a sufficient set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more dirt lines!
reviews.reviewText: This dust pan works amazingly. I don't have to back up the pan and continually sweep a line of dirt - it gets it the first time because of the extra lip. The brush is very flexible so gets into corners well. I'm very happy and I think it's great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for tight spaces
reviews.reviewText: We used this for both wet and dry cleaning. It is easy to reach tight spaces. The dense bristles are good at cleaning dust and the toothed dustpan is good to transfer the dust. The material is sturdy and yet light enough to handle. The price is really good and since the brush nestles within the pan, it is easy to store and save space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The broom fits nice into the dustpan. Cute color. The dustpan has a nice area to brush off the broom to keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nothing special here, it's just ok
reviews.reviewText: The broom strands are not very firm and started sticking out in different directions after one use. I like a firmer broom because it works better on the floor and carpet and usually lasts longer. My old one that I was wanting to replace works just as well, if not better than this one.
